entry.title: Derby Originals Heavy Duty Equestrian Bucket Hook Hanger - Lot of 4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Hardware
Price: 9.95

Durable design bucket hook mounts easily and has a tab to help prevent the bucket from being knocked off the hook. Made from steel for long-lasting durability.
  • DURABILITY: This bucket hook will not disappoint. The hook is designed to withstand a lot of weight and with the heavy-duty, the metal will prevent bending or breaking. The ring helps prevent the bucket from being knocked off if your horse is playful with his or her's water bucket. 
  • EASY TO INSTALL: Simply take the two provided screws and choose your destination you desire and screw in. Please make sure the hook is properly secure. They can be installed either outdoors or indoors and can be easily removed and reused. 
  • PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: each bucket hook wall mount includes a set of screws. 
  • SIZE: 5 3/8" X 1" X 1/2"

entry.title: Derby Round Eye Panic Snaps 4" for Horse Leads (Lot of 4)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Hardware
Price: 12.25

Used to tie horses and other animals. These useful quick release snaps are designed to release when a certain amount of pressure is applied to them.Designed to keep horses, humans, and other animals safe in panic situations.
  • Intended for horse and stable use only
  • Size: 1/2 X 4 Inch
  • Nickel Plated

entry.title: Derby Steel Plate Snap 3" for Stable Use Lot of 4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Hardware
Price: 4.95

Lot of 4 snaps designed specifically to be used at the barn. Whether for horse leads, water bucket straps or other stable use, these snaps are an excellent choice. They are constructed out of heavy duty nickel plated steel. These snaps are not intended for use in climbing or similar purposes.

  •  Lot of 4 - Great Value!
  •  Made of Nickel Plated Steel
  •  Designed to be used for Stables and Horse leads
  •  Excellent for Horse Water Bucket Straps

entry.title: Derby Originals Premium 4" Brass Round Eye Bolt Snaps - Ideal for Use in the Barn, Pasture, Home, or Garage
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Hardware
Price: 2.50 - 9.95 (2 variants)

Our premium 1” x 4” brass eye bolt snaps are ideal for a myriad of equine, barn, pet, household, garage, or automotive uses thanks to their heavy duty and high quality design and convenient sizing. These snaps are great for DIY projects and tack makers who are looking for premium hardware to add to their handmade leashes, lead ropes, halters, bridles, reins, wither straps, and more!

 

PREMIUM BRASS CONSTRUCTION - these sturdy bolt snaps are made from premium brass plated metal that is incredibly strong and long-lasting, and ideal for not only equestrian but also home, garage, and automotive uses.

CONVENIENT SIZING - these 1” eye hole snaps measure 4” long and are the perfect size for many applications such as using for lead ropes, leashes, bucket hangers, gate closures, and more! These snaps can accommodate up to 1” wide straps.

360 DEGREE SWIVEL - our bolt snaps can swivel 360 degrees, making them exceedingly easy to use for any application.

AVAILABLE IN LOTS OF 1 OR 6 - our bolt snaps are available in convenient lots of 1 or 6 snaps for a myriad of uses.

PERFECT FOR USE WITH TACK - these bolt snaps are the perfect size and shape for use with all major brands of lead ropes, as well as trailer and cross ties, and a million other applications!

entry.title: Derby Originals Nickel Plated Round Scissor Trigger Snaps 3/4"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Stable Hardware
Price: 1.95

Great for reins, leads, halters, gates, and many other barn and house hold accessories!

DURABLE DESIGN - these sturdy nickel-plated scissor snaps are designed to last and hold up tough in a variety of applications.

IDEAL FOR MANY APPLICATIONS - these trigger snaps are great for use to make or customize horse tack and for use in the barn, out at pasture, or in the garage.

AVAILABLE IN LOTS OF 10 AND 25 - these snaps are available in quantities of 10 or 25.

¾” ROUND OPENING - these snaps feature a ¾” wide rounded bottom.
